name: Ford, Appellant, v. Fidelity Mutual Life Insurance Company
name_abbreviation: Ford v. Fidelity Mutual Life Insurance

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Sohapeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Ford, Appellant, v. Fidelity Mutual Life Insurance Company.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed upon the learned opinion of Judge Finletter.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: George J. Edwards, Jr., with him Robert F. Bonner, for appellant.
Ira Jewell Williams, Jr., of Brown & Williams, with him George U. Wilson, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Ford, Appellant, v. Fidelity Mutual Life Insurance Company.
Argued January 3, 1934.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Sohapeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
George J. Edwards, Jr., with him Robert F. Bonner, for appellant.
Ira Jewell Williams, Jr., of Brown & Williams, with him George U. Wilson, for appellee.
January 30, 1934:
